column5: Packed up the gear and boat and headed out to the Kawarthas for a little fun on the water with my new fishing buddy Steve . Dispite the call for 60 % chance of rain we decided to head out anyway. Here we go ready to launch at the Gov Dock!! After that we were on the water just hammerin them wooo hoo !!! Steve Living the High Life !!! Here Fishy Fishy Fishy!! After a great day fishing some nice size Largies i land my self a nice Lunker what just put a cap on a perfect day out!! The Release!! Too Quick for the Cam!
some real nice hawgs! Thanks for sharing.
Great report bassmastermike  real nice slabs for sure!! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great Report. Some nice bass! Thanks for sharing.
Nice going dude, some nice fish there!  (glad to see you're still alive and kicking)
Hey Mike Loved the post with you and cliff on you great fishing trek . Thanks for the Replies!
Great report, Mike! Nice meeting you today! Remember... SET HARD! SET OFTEN! Dave
those are some nice fat bass!  thanks for posting  Cheers!
